metadata.name: Fantasma #1
metadata.description: The FANTASMAS Collection is a compilation of those things we love and want to keep alive – icons of our culture that represent who we are through the media that shaped us. They’re the movies and tv shows we grew up watching together, the tunes we bobbed our heads to, the games that kept us up late at night. They are the stories we want to pass down to our children and to future generations. These are the things we’ll lose if we can’t get our collective shit together.
